cards.title: Finance Leasing – when you want to control it yourself
texts: Finance leasing is a cost-effective and simple option for a company that wants to keep control. The car's mileage is not limited and the company is responsible for maintenance and the car's residual value at the end of the lease period. This suits companies best that have their own maintenance solutions and want to maximize cost-efficiency.
Suitable for those seeking a cost-effective solution.

cards.title: Flex Leasing – freedom and predictability in one contract
texts: Flex leasing brings maintenance to the same invoice, but costs are determined according to actual expenses. Residual value is assessed based on market value and at the end of the lease period the customer can either continue the lease contract or look for a buyer for the car. Flex leasing suits companies that want convenience and keep doors open for different options after the contract period.
Good option if you want to combine flexibility and control.

cards.title: Full-Service Leasing – convenience and predictability
texts: Full-service leasing is a hassle-free complete solution. With one monthly price, the company gets a car and desired services – from maintenance to washing and tire services. The supplier is responsible for the car's residual value, and you don't need to worry about vehicle resale. This is an excellent choice for companies that want to budget costs accurately and minimize administrative work.
Perfect solution for companies that value predictability and convenience.

cards.title: Mini Leasing for businesses – Power for business without commitment
texts: Do you need a car for your business quickly and for a fixed period? Mini leasing is a flexible solution for short-term vehicle needs – without long-term commitments or ownership concerns.
benefits: Ready-to-use car immediately – even for the next day
Contract period 1–12 months, exactly according to your needs
Fixed monthly price includes insurance, maintenance and tire services
No down payment, no resale worries
perfectFor: As a waiting period for a new company car or delivery completion
As a substitute car during maintenance or repair
For projects or temporary work assignments
To cover seasonal or temporary additional needs
cards.summary: Mini leasing is a straightforward, cost-effective and fast way to ensure business doesn't stop!

equipmentLeasing.heading: Equipment and Machinery Financing – Invest in efficiency, without large one-time costs
texts: Do you need machinery or equipment for production, construction or business – but don't want to tie up capital or buy outright? Equipment and machinery leasing offers your business a flexible and cost-effective way to get the necessary tools in use immediately – without large one-time costs.
benefits: Fixed rent throughout the rental period 12-72 months
Equipment remains company property after the rental period
Leasing rents can be deducted in taxation
No need to tie up capital in investment
Doesn't bind fixed assets to the balance sheet
